scripts.info: echo keyvalue training project using node + express + postgres
scripts.start-server: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.migration:create: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:create
scripts.migration:generate: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:generate -d dist/src/db/data-source.js
scripts.migration:run: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:run -d dist/src/db/data-source.js
scripts.migration:revert: npm run build && npx typeorm migration:revert -d dist/src/db/data-source.js
